summary: a note on dan and phil:
body:
a note on dan and phil:

i care about these two nerds more than anything. in all seriousness, i am so concerned with their wellbeing. although it is sad that we haven’t gotten a video from dan in months, he’s clearly working on himself and that’s so important. i know we talk about this a lot, but i just wanted to address it again. dan and phil are both such amazing human beings and they deserve all the support we can give them. i genuinely wish nothing but immense happiness for them both. i’m gonna support them through everything.

blog.name: dnps-trashcan
blog.description:
A Mess™

julia | 16 | she/her | 🇬🇧+🇵🇱

~those two long beans own my entire heart~

title: phil vids recommendations
body:
feeling lost during the hiatus? dunno what to watch? here’s a list of my favourite joint dnp videos to rewatch during this difficult time!

why i went to hospital: funny story, domesticity, love storytimes

viewers pick my outfits: top quality, cheese costume, amazing

why i can’t go back to the gym: rip phil but really funny

things i regret buying (series): oh philly, full of mistakes, plus some cursed objects

tour of my brain: so so so creative, so much effort too, love it

reacting to my childhood horror movie: actually a good movie, esp. for age and times/technology

why i was a weird kid (series): phil phil phil, special boy, love him tho

smoking fail: phil is v v v cool, no one just sees it

the holy mother: classic, wild, obvs happens to phil

deep sea creatures & rip simon: what the heck even are they?, so extra for the funeral, probs getting another soon

a static lullaby - toxic cover: work of art

xxx

dan version | dnp version

tags: yeah this wasnt a funny post but thats apaprently the tag for posts about like 150 notes so here we are
title: dan vids recommendations
body:
feeling lost during the hiatus? dunno what to watch? here’s a list of my favourite joint dnp videos to rewatch during this difficult time!

the story of my hamster: can literally rewatch so many times and still laugh so hard, classic

what not do do at uni: banger, so funny, good advice too

our awkward fancy meal & our awkward moments: absolutely love him w/ louise, fucking hilarious, will laugh every single time

my bahamas travel disaster: poor dan, good meme.

dan’s diss track: not a real phannie unless you know every single word😤😤

top dan memes (series): possibly the best content on the channel, length = perfect, top bants

panic alarm & power nap: duet of horror, love the storytimes, poor little dan

sexy internet dating 1&2: real father of tinder prank videos, we stan mr guinea pig

my evil piano teacher: simply cannot miss this one out, true art, rip all of dan’s hope and dreams, at least arthur had a gay rat wedding now

hello internet: :)

phil version | dnp version

summary: I’m going to explain myself as to why I don’t think the facial hair suited Phil, in the most positive way possible so people see...
body:
I’m going to explain myself as to why I don’t think the facial hair suited Phil, in the most positive way possible so people see that I’m not hating on Phil, and never ever would because I LOVE HIM~! I didn’t mean to seem so harsh with the way I worded it. At the time, I was having a crap as hell morning, and it just shocked me seeing him look so different. I was almost panicking in a way. What I meant to say is, that the reason I don’t think facial hair suits Phil is because of who he is. You know, Phil Lester is such a childish soul, and that’s what makes him the Phil we love~ I just felt the facial hair was more mature than his heart. It made him look too much like a tough guy, when he’s really a tol softie~ Yes, he was very handsome, he is a beautiful boy~ I just didn’t see Phil Lester as someone with facial hair, and that’s okay~! If he really did want facial hair, I suppose I could get used to it, but honestly I love Phil’s face just the way it is~ Did I mention he has the clearest and most perfect skin, and he deserves to show it off~? I mean that’s some clear skin he’s got~ But yes, in no way was I attacking Phil, or hating on the facial hair. It was just very shocking, and I just feel it isn’t really his style~ He can do whatever he likes, but I personally just like to see his beautiful face with his nice skin~ : ) It’s quite funny how the people thirsting over Phil with facial hair were able get angry and mad when Phil shaved without being called haters ( no hate to them, just making a point lol, you’re thirst is valid~ ), and me not preferring the look was the thing that was considered hate lol. I’m not saying I’m a perfect person, it just hurts knowing people think I could actually hate on these guys. They’re amazing~ I just want people to know I never choose hate, I only want to spread positivity~ Nothing more~

ヽ(*＾ω＾*)ﾉ ♡♡♡♡♡♡

( and you~ :’) 💕 )
